mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_DEL_FL ,MEMBER_LEVEL_NO ,(SELECT MEMBER_LEVEL_NAME FROM MEMBER_LEVEL L WHERE L.MEMBER_LEVEL_NO = M.MEMBER_LEVEL_NO) MEMBER_LEVEL_NAME ,(SELECT MEMBER_LEVEL_IMG FROM MEMBER_LEVEL L WHERE L.MEMBER_LEVEL_NO = M.MEMBER_LEVEL_NO) MEMBER_LEVEL_IMG ,NVL(LOGHISTORY_COUNT,0) LOGHISTORY_COUNT ,NVL(BOARD_COUNT,0) MEMBER_BOARD_COUNT ,NVL(COMMENT_COUNT,0) MEMBER_COMMENT_COUNT FROM "MEMBER" M LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, COUNT(LOGIN_DATE) LOGHISTORY_COUNT FROM LOGIN_HISTORY GROUP BY MEMBER_NO ORDER BY 1) USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(BOARD_NO) BOARD_COUNT ,MEMBER_NO FROM BOARD GROUP BY MEMBER_NO ORDER BY 2) USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(COMMENT_NO) COMMENT_COUNT, MEMBER_NO FROM "COMMENT" GROUP BY MEMBER_NO ORDER BY 2) USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_CODE, TITLE_TAG_NO, TITLE_TAG_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, READ_COUNT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(B_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END B_CREATE_DATE,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO =B.BOARD_NO AND COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TITLE_TAG USING(TITLE_TAG_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
